title: Council Directive 79/343/Euratom of 27 March 1979 amending Directive 76/579/Euratom laying down the revised basic safety standards for the health protection of the general public and workers against the dangers of ionizing radiation
header:
( 1 ) OJ NO C 6 , 8 . 1 . 1979 , P . 84 .
( 2 ) OPINION DELIVERED ON 12 AND 13 JULY 1978 ( NOT YET PUBLISHED IN THE OFFICIAL JOURNAL ).
( 3 ) OJ NO L 187 , 12 . 7 . 1976 , P . 1 .
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE
OF 27 MARCH 1979
AMENDING DIRECTIVE 76/579/EURATOM LAYING DOWN THE REVISED BASIC SAFETY STANDARDS FOR THE HEALTH PROTECTION OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC AND WORKERS AGAINST THE DANGERS OF IONIZING RADIATION
( 79/343/EURATOM )
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
ARTICLE 40 ( 1 ) OF DIRECTIVE 76/579/EURATOM SHALL BE AMENDED AS FOLLOWS :
' 1 .  THE MEMBER STATES SHALL TAKE THE MEASURES NECESSARY TO COMPLY WITH THIS DIRECTIVE WITHIN A PERIOD OF FOUR YEARS FROM THE DATE OF NOTIFICATION THEREOF . '
THIS DIRECTIVE IS ADDRESSED TO THE MEMBER STATES .
attachments:
DONE AT BRUSSELS , 27 MARCH 1979 .
FOR THE COUNCIL
